title: (Android) rotation mobile example black screen and then crash

labels.name: A-Windowing
labels.description: Platform-agnostic interface layer to run your app in

labels.name: O-Android
labels.description: Specific to the Android mobile operating system

labels.name: S-Needs-Investigation
labels.description: This issue requires detective work to figure out what's going wrong

body:
## Bevy version

bevy 0.15.3

building on macos with m1 
for
samsung OneUI 6.1 android 14 

## What you did

Rotating the screen for the bevy mobile example on android made the screen black

After the screen turn black the app doesn't crash until i click on the screen at which point it crashes within a few seconds

## Additional information

<details>
<summary>Android logs:</summary>
